messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

it updates for not working as instructions say for a parrot re updates for working instructions say for parrot hi guys tried use trio conference device parrot but could never scheduled meeting calendar device calendar meetings have link for meeting expect be able use device yet able there anything doing wrong regards developer sent wednesday december updates for importance high hello everyone we would like present you with latest updates with regards transition into same level other offices what done last two weeks meeting rooms conference devices have installed remaining meeting rooms older computers have replaced with newer ones please find here guide how use conference phone here guide how use trio conference device instructions also be printed placed meeting rooms for easy access virtual infrastructures physical servers have moved rack telecommunications rack cleaned up main objectives remaining client finalize moving client into virtual infrastructure move test environments onto platform under groups update groups can more easily quickly access environments following high level summary key remaining actions achieve these objectives we keep you updated our progress with these month date tasks december th client have remaining client public moved under note could be pushed currently undergoing changes their infrastructure st groups have owners for remaining ad groups updated instructions how manage them sent out th have virtual environment commissioned under th have virtual machines migrated virtual environment february th have virtual machines updated have them moved under misc have ancillary tasks related telephony completed please also keep mind below contact details if you feel your ticket being or handled per agreed level agreement manager for legacy infrastructure migrations manager server room access contact facilities manager always should you have any questions or suggestions feel free reach out yours faithfully ext sent wednesday november updates for hello everyone we have working hard get into level but recognize level still requires improvement result we have initiated fortnightly meetings with representatives review any open issues review progress remaining actions complete transition into same level other offices what done november infrastructure brought into owners were added part projects ad groups conference devices were added part meeting rooms main objectives remaining client finalize moving client into virtual infrastructure move test environments onto platform under meeting rooms upgrade remaining meeting rooms groups update groups can more easily quickly access environments following high level summary key remaining actions achieve these objectives we keep you updated our progress with these month date tasks december rd meeting rooms have conference devices installed remaining meeting rooms th have physical servers moved rack th meeting rooms have old computers meeting rooms replaced with newer ones th have telecommunications rack cleaned up th client have remaining client public moved under st groups have owners for remaining ad groups updated instructions how manage them sent out th have virtual environment commissioned under th have virtual machines migrated virtual environment february th have virtual machines updated have them moved under misc have ancillary tasks related telephony completed please also keep mind below contact details if you feel your ticket being or handled per agreed level agreement manager for legacy infrastructure migrations manager server room access contact facilities manager always should you have any questions or suggestions feel free reach out yours faithfully ext
